body_content.explanation: used to express disappointment or disapproval:
examples: He says "Aw, I thought you were somebody else."
If you don't vote, you can't go around saying, "Aw man, everything's all wrong!"
Aw gee, you said you weren't gonna cry!

body_content.explanation: used to express sympathy or love, especially when you find something or someone cute (= attractive and pleasant in the way that babies or baby animals are):
examples: All the aunties had that "Aw, isn't he cute?" look on their faces.
Aww, bless their hearts, they did their best.
